title: Schedule B: information to be included in
context: [ยง431:4-233] Schedule B: information to be included in statements filed by or on behalf of a participant other than an insurer in a proxy solicitation in an election contest. Information in schedule B shall include, among other things: (1) The name and address of the insurer; (2) Detailed information about the participant; (3) The participant&rsquo;s interest in the stock of the insurer; (4) A description of the time and circumstances in which the participant became involved with the solicitation and the nature and extent of the activities or proposed activities of the participant; and (5) The date and signature of the participant. [L 2000, c 24, pt of ยง2]
